languages.text: При упоминании флогистона Паскаль заметно воодушевляется. Сделка с подозрительным индивидом магосу индифферентна, однако он советует разузнать побольше о залежах флогистона, чтобы использовать его на благо вашего же протектората.

traits.locale_text: При упоминании силовых кристаллов Паскаль заметно воодушевляется. Сделка с подозрительным индивидом магосу индифирентна, однако он советует разузнать побольше о залежах кристаллов, чтобы использовать их на благо вашей же торговой империи.

languages.text: Pasqal becomes visibly animated at the mention of flogiston. Though indifferent to the prospect of a deal with the shadowy individual, the Magos nonetheless recommends you find out more about flogiston deposits. Your own protectorate would benefit from the knowledge.
languages.original_text: При упоминании флогистона Паскаль заметно воодушевляется. Сделка с подозрительным индивидом магосу индифферентна, однако он советует разузнать побольше о залежах флогистона, чтобы использовать его на благо вашего же протектората.

traits.locale_text: The mention of power crystals makes Pasqal palpably enthusiastic. Indifferent toward making a deal with the shadowy individual, the Magos nonetheless recommends finding out more about crystal deposits. Your own trade empire would benefit from the knowledge.

The mention of power crystals makes Pasqal palpably enthusiastic. Indifferent toward making a deal with the shadowy individual, the Magos nonetheless recommends finding out more about crystal deposits. Your own trade empire would benefit from the knowledge.

Pasqal becomes visibly animated at the mention of flogiston. Though indifferent to the prospect of a deal with the shadowy individual, the Magos nonetheless recommends you find out more about flogiston deposits. Your own protectorate would benefit from the knowledge.

Pasqal becomes visibly animated at the mention of power crystals. Though indifferent to the prospect of a deal with the shadowy individual, the Magos nonetheless recommends you find out more about crystal deposits. Your own trade empire would benefit from the knowledge.

Pasqal becomes visibly animated at the mention of flogiston. Though indifferent to the prospect of a deal with the shadowy individual, the Magos nonetheless recommends you find out more about flogiston deposits. Your own protectorate would benefit from the knowledge.

languages.text: 一提到燃素，帕斯卡明显变得活跃起来。尽管这位贤者并不看好这场形迹可疑的交易，但他建议你多了解一下燃素的相关知识，因为你的王朝将会从这些知识中受益。
languages.original_text: Pasqal becomes visibly animated at the mention of flogiston. Though indifferent to the prospect of a deal with the shadowy individual, the Magos nonetheless recommends you find out more about flogiston deposits. Your own protectorate would benefit from the knowledge.

traits.locale_text: 一提到燃素，帕斯卡明显变得活跃起来。尽管这位贤者并不看好这场形迹可疑的交易，但他建议你多了解一下燃素的相关知识，因为你的王朝将会从这些知识中受益。

languages.text: Pasqal se anima visiblemente al oír hablar de flogisto. Aunque la perspectiva de negociar con este sospechoso individuo le es indiferente, el magos recomienda que te informes sobre los depósitos de flogisto de todos modos. A tu protectorado le vendría bien el conocimiento.
languages.original_text: Pasqal becomes visibly animated at the mention of flogiston. Though indifferent to the prospect of a deal with the shadowy individual, the Magos nonetheless recommends you find out more about flogiston deposits. Your own protectorate would benefit from the knowledge.

traits.locale_text: Pasqal se anima visiblemente al oír hablar de cristales de energía. Aunque la perspectiva de negociar con este sospechoso individuo le es indiferente, el magos recomienda que te informes sobre los depósitos de cristales de energía de todos modos. A tu protectorado le vendría bien el conocimiento.

languages.text: Pasqal erwacht zum Leben, als von Flogiston die Rede ist. Der Magos hält zwar nicht viel von der Vorstellung, einen Handel mit dem zwielichtigen Captain einzugehen, rät dir aber dennoch dringend, mehr über Flogistonvorkommen in Erfahrung zu bringen. Dein eigenes Protektorat würde von diesem Wissen profitieren.
languages.original_text: Pasqal becomes visibly animated at the mention of flogiston. Though indifferent to the prospect of a deal with the shadowy individual, the Magos nonetheless recommends you find out more about flogiston deposits. Your own protectorate would benefit from the knowledge.

traits.locale_text: Pasqal erwacht zum Leben, als von Energiekristallen die Rede ist. Der Magos hält zwar nicht viel von der Vorstellung, einen Handel mit dem zwielichtigen Captain einzugehen, rät dir aber dennoch dringend, mehr über Kristallvorkommen in Erfahrung zu bringen. Dein eigenes Protektorat würde von diesem Wissen profitieren.

languages.text: Pasqal devient très agité lorsqu'il est fait mention du flogiston. S'il ne s'oppose pas à l'idée d'un marché avec cet individu mystérieux, le magos vous recommande tout de même d'en apprendre davantage sur ces fameux dépôts de flogiston. Votre protectorat pourrait grandement bénéficier de ces connaissances.
languages.original_text: Pasqal becomes visibly animated at the mention of flogiston. Though indifferent to the prospect of a deal with the shadowy individual, the Magos nonetheless recommends you find out more about flogiston deposits. Your own protectorate would benefit from the knowledge.

traits.locale_text: Pasqal s'agite ostensiblement lorsqu'il est fait mention des cristaux de pouvoir. S'il ne s'oppose pas à l'idée d'un marché avec cet individu mystérieux, le magos vous recommande tout de même d'en apprendre davantage sur ces fameux dépôts. Votre protectorat pourrait grandement bénéficier de ces connaissances.

languages.text: フロギストンの話になると、パスカルは目に見えて興奮している。怪しげな人間との取引という点に関心はないようだが、マゴスの彼はフロギストン鉱床の情報をもっと集めろと推してくる。こちらの保護国にも、その情報があれば利益があるだろう。
languages.original_text: Pasqal becomes visibly animated at the mention of flogiston. Though indifferent to the prospect of a deal with the shadowy individual, the Magos nonetheless recommends you find out more about flogiston deposits. Your own protectorate would benefit from the knowledge.

traits.locale_text: フロギストンの話になると、パスカルは目に見えて興奮している。怪しげな人間との取引という点に関心はないようだが、マゴスの彼はフロギストン鉱床の情報をもっと集めろと推してくる。こちらの保護国にも、その情報があれば利益があるだろう。

languages.text: Pasqal, flogiston adı geçince gözle görülür şekilde heyecanlanıyor. Karanlık bir kimseyle yapılacak anlaşmaya kayıtsız olsa da Magos, flogiston yatakları hakkında daha fazla bilgi edinmeni öneriyor. Öğreneceğin şeylerin kendi protektorana faydası olabilir.
languages.original_text: Pasqal becomes visibly animated at the mention of flogiston. Though indifferent to the prospect of a deal with the shadowy individual, the Magos nonetheless recommends you find out more about flogiston deposits. Your own protectorate would benefit from the knowledge.
